text: What three things do you need to remember from this video?
What school does Grace belong to?
Do you usually use videos to learn by yourself? What challenges do you imagine exist when using videos in a classroom context?
How many ways are there to share edpuzzled videos?
Have you watched this great presentation about the why hooks were added to React?
Before you watch the video, how do you think we can find Big Ideas videos on Edpuzzle?
Are you using promises in your code challenge? Why are you or are you not
What extra information does Edpuzzle provide about the progress of your students?
When you were in the classroom, were all the students participating on a daily basis?
How often have you regretted your technical choices months after you made them?
If you don't know how to answer a question, what should you do?
